WriteAccountRestrictions.meaning: This edge indicates the principal has the ability to modify several properties on the target principal, most notably the msDS-AllowedToActOnBehalfOfOtherIdentity attribute. The ability to modify the msDS-AllowedToActOnBehalfOfOtherIdentity property allows an attacker to abuse resource-based constrained delegation to compromise the remote computer system.
WriteAccountRestrictions.common: See the AllowedToAct edge section for abuse info
